title: Which singer has given the most number of hit songs worldwide? - Quora

response.answer_text: Probably the Bee Gees Just to name a few of their compositions for others and covers, most of them number ones in USA or UK. Woman in love - (Barbra Streisand) - USA n1 Islands in the stream (Kenny Rogers And Dolly Parton) - Usa n1 Heartbreaker (Dionne Warwick) n 2 UK Chain Reaction (Diana Ross) - UK n 2 Come on over - Olivia Newton-John - USA n 1 If I can’t Have you - Yvonne Elliman n 1 USA More than a Woman - Tavares - n1 USA Grease (Frankie Walli) - US n1 Emotions (Samantha Sang) - USA n1 Emotions (destiny’s Child) n 3 UK Inmortality - Celine Dion I just Want to be your Everyting (Andy Gibb) - USA n 1 Love is thicker than Water (Andy Gibb) - USA n1 Tragedy (Steps) - UK n 1 Words (Boyzone) - UK n1 To love Somebody (Michael Bolton) - USA n1 and many many more… they wrote full albums for Barbra streisand ( 2 albums), Kenny Rogers, Diana Ross, Dionne Warwick and many singles for many artist and their songs have been covered by hundreds os artist including Elvis Presley, Janis Joplin, The animals, Tom Jones, Rod Steward, Bruce Sprinsteen, Bono, etc…

Ryan Tedder from OneRepublic He has written and produced Beyonce's biggest hit : Halo Here are some songs which he has written for other artists : Jonas brothers - Sucker2. Maps, Lucky strike & love somebody - maroon 5 3. Burn - Ellie goulding 4. co written Easier and a couple songs from the album “CALM” - 5SOS 5. Happier - Ed Sheeran 6. Rumour has it, Remedy & Turning tables - Adele 7. Neon lights - Demi Lovato 8. Bleeding love - Leona Lewis 9. I want you to know - Zedd ft Selena Gomez 10. Welcome to new York & i know places - Taylor Swift 11. Got 2 luv u - Sean paul 12. XO - Beyonce 13. Seasons - Olly murs 14. Bonfire heart - James blunt 15. Already gone - Kelly Clarkson 16. Faith - Stevie wonder ft Ariana Grande 17. Fighter - Gym class heroes And has written several hits for his own band OneRepublic : Counting stars, Apologize, if I lose myself, counting stars, let's hurt tonight, rescue me, good life,etcc
